li.label: Rim-Men Culture
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef}s ansestors are outcasts of the Empire. Their mixed Akaviri Tseasci and Imperial blood forcing them from their home in Cyrodiil to the near rim of the Empires influence near Elsweyr.

li.label: Nibenese Culture
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} comes from the lands around the bay of Nibenay, hailing from the eastern part of Cyrodiil. {PAWN_nameDef} is always looking for ways to make more septims or create something new in order to gain an advantage over someone else.

li.label: Colovian Culture
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is of Colovian blood, hailing from the western part of Cyrodiil. {PAWN_nameDef} is proud of their heritage and the honor that bestows them, be it adventuring across Tamriel or serving honorably in the mighty Imperial Legions.

li.label: Heartlander Culture
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a true Imperial, coming from the heartlands of Cyrodiil and more specifically the area around the Imperial City and Imperial Isle. {PAWN_nameDef} is a Heartlander, a true heir of Cyrodiil and worthy of the glory of the Empire.
